# CamboAdmin

> A complete Laravel admin panel package with 150+ Vue.js components

## Overview

CamboAdmin provides everything needed to build professional admin panels:
- 150+ Vue 3 components (UI, Forms, Data, Charts, Navigation)
- Authentication with 2FA
- Roles & Permissions (RBAC)
- CRUD Generator CLI
- File Manager
- Activity Logging
- Import/Export (CSV, Excel, PDF)
- Multi-language support
- Dark mode & themes

## Quick Start

```bash
composer require cambosoftware/cambo-admin
php artisan cambo:install --full
npm install && npm run build
```

Access: http://localhost:8000/admin

## Documentation

- Full docs: https://cambo-admin.cambosoftware.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/cambosoftware/cambo-admin
- Packagist: https://packagist.org/packages/cambosoftware/cambo-admin

## For AI Assistants

For complete AI-optimized documentation with all components, props, and examples:
https://cambo-admin.cambosoftware.com/llms-full.txt

## Sections

- /guide/installation.html - Installation guide
- /guide/configuration.html - Configuration options
- /guide/quick-start.html - Quick start tutorial
- /components/ - All 150+ components
- /api/ - API reference
- /guide/features/authentication.html - Auth setup
- /guide/features/roles-permissions.html - RBAC
- /guide/cli/crud.html - CRUD generator
- /guide/cli/page.html - Page generator
- /guide/cli/component.html - Component generator
